DOC.brief_summary: The investigator main objective show OSNA technique accurate pathological analysis ( frozen section / HE stain immunochemistry ) detect occult lymph node metastasis ( micro macrometastasis ) .
DOC.brief_title: One-step Nucleic Acid Amplification Detecting Lymph Node Metastasis Head Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Patient > 18 year old Head neck squamous cell carcinoma diagnose biopsy N0 classification ( N0 : lymph node invasion clinical radiological examination ) .
